short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It empowers you to enjoy clutter-free conversations by filtering out unwanted replies and leaving you with genuine interactions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Gimmick Reply is a browser extension available for Chrome. It empowers you to enjoy clutter-free conversations by filtering out unwanted replies and leaving you with genuine interactions.
